name: Zombie Friends
description:
The Game

It's another zombie apocalypse and your friends got infected. It's now up to you to try and  save them. All you gotta do is lower their infection level by shooting them with your special healing gun.

Just remember, even though they're the friends you know and love, they are still zombies, so whatever you do, don't let them get you!

Controls

The game controls are pretty simple. You use the Right/Left arrow keys to move, Up button to jump and Left Ctrl to shoot. That's it!

This game was made as part of "My First Game Jam: Summer 2022" . It was my first game jam so I decided to go solo and try to do everything on my own. I  hope you enjoy what I made.

Thanks for visiting!
